Text: Alaku Je̩riko chaka la chere, ma mʼukodo-wñ ko tunyu todu abo Israe̩l; e̩ne̩ du adufu n, e̩ne̩ du la agudu wʼejefu n.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini. Go, u mʼiJe̩riko du tʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ me̩, kpai onu-wñ, kpai ame̩nugbiti-wñ ku ma nʼuwohi,
oñ ane̩ ale ewo le̩ daka, aboke̩le̩ ku ma jogu chaka ale ewo le̩ daka onuʼka. Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ache gbogbo nyʼo̩jo̩ me̩fa.
Oñ amatama mebie ane̩ o̩kakachi o̩ga echi mebie ale rʼo̩gba akpati le̩; tak o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ ama ale ewo le̩ daka onu mebie, oñ amatama anʼo̩kakachi-ma afa.

Tak i awatu, e̩gba ku ma fa igba o̩ga echi le̩ taa, kʼame̩ la gbo̩ omu o̩kakachi le̩, amone̩ du anʼukwa akwa nana; tak o̩do̩ aku ewo le̩ agulo̩ bʼane̩ ma, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ efu amone̩ le̩ afʼe̩do̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ ate̩gu tʼo̩gba-wñ alo.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua, o̩ma Nun le̩, fʼamatama do̩ wa oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mʼakpati alo le̩ du, tak amatama mebie ki nʼo̩kakachi o̩ga echi mebie rʼo̩gba akpati Jihofa le̩.
Tak i ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ kanyi alo ku me̩ le ewo le̩ daka, ku me̩ je̩ ñw aboke̩le̩ kʼo̩la-ma che̩mu ogu ku ma lale rʼo̩gba akpati Jihofa.
Oñ alu ki Jo̩shua ka ñw amone̩ le̩, amatama mebie ku ma nʼo̩kakachi o̩ga echi mebie o̩gba Jihofa le̩ le rʼo̩gba, oñ ma nʼo̩kakachi-ma afa, akpati alo Jihofa la tʼuma ubi.
Oñ aboke̩le̩ ku ma mʼo̩la ogu le rʼo̩gba amatama ku ma fa o̩kakachi le̩, oñ abo ki dʼubi tʼakpati ubi, ma nʼo̩kakachi afa abu ku ma alo.
Jo̩shua la ñwa ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki kpogu n, e̩ne̩ du ki gbʼomu-me̩ n, o̩la du ki kwef alu-me̩ dufu n, gbogbo nyʼo̩jo̩ kʼu naka ñwu me̩ ku me̩ kpogu; e̩gbale̩ taku me̩ akpogu.
Abe̩le̩ i je̩ ñw akpati Jihofa ki le ewo le̩ daka, i le onuʼka; taku ma lewa uru le̩, oñ ma kworu.
Taki Jo̩shua takpa kwane̩ odudu, oñ amatama mʼakpati Jihofa du.

Tak amatama mebie ku ma nʼo̩kakachi o̩ga echi mebie rʼo̩gba akpati Jihofa lale, ma nafa o̩kakachi le̩ alo waa; oñ aboke̩le̩ ku ma mʼo̩la ogu le̩ le rʼo̩gba-ma, tak abo ki dʼubi tʼakpati Jihofa ubi, ma nʼo̩kakachi afa abu ku ma lo.
Tak o̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ ma le ewo le̩ daka onuʼka, oñ ma mudabi tʼef uru. Abe̩le̩ ma che gbogbo o̩jo̩ me̩fa.
Oñ lewatu o̩jo̩ e̩kebie ma takpa kwane̩ e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ añwa bulubulu, oñ ma le ewo le̩ daka alu le̩ onu mebie: ma la le ewo le̩ daka onu mebie o̩jo̩ le̩.
Tak i lewatu, onu e̩kebie-wñ, e̩gba kʼamatama fa o̩kakachi-ma, Jo̩shua ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ kpogu ke; todu Jihofa mʼewo-i du ñwu me̩ me̩.
Me̩ ki mʼewo-i dute̩ ñwu Jihofa, tʼowñ, tʼe̩wñ du ki jʼefu-wñ; chai Rehab, ajo̩ko̩ le̩ kate adeju, owñ kpai abo du ku ma jʼef unyi-wñ kpai owñ, todabu kʼowñ mʼabo kʼa kpuche̩ le̩ ko maja.

I la chʼe-ame̩, me̩ ki fʼo̩la-me̩ de ugbo e̩wñ ku me̩ dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ le̩, tode̩gba ku me̩ mʼu dute̩ ku me̩ adabi wa chi kwef uwñ; me̩ fʼabe̩le̩ che maku me̩ aje̩ ñw uru Israe̩l ki mud e̩wñ ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ge̩, ku me̩ ma la je̩ ñw u ñmin.
Ama ajifa-wñ chaka kpai o̩jamalia-wñ chaka kpai e̩wñ eku ebije ikpa kpai ebije, e̩wñ le̩ afo̩ ñw u Jihofa; e-le̩ atʼef akpulu e-Jihofa.

Abe̩le̩ amone̩ le̩ kwokpogu, oñ ma fʼo̩kakachi fa. Oñ i watu, e̩gba kʼamone̩ le̩ gbʼomu o̩kakachi ma nʼukwa elile akwa, tak o̩do̩ aku le̩ gulo̩ bane̩ma, oñ amone̩ du mute̩gu nyʼewo le̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ fʼe̩do̩ kʼe̩do̩ tʼo̩gba-wñ, oñ ma fʼewo le̩ du.
Taku ma nʼalu obe̩chageli kʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef ewo le̩ jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼonobule̩ tʼimo̩to̩ tʼogijo tʼo̩kokuno̩ tʼe̩wño̩re̩ egini tʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩.
Taki Jo̩shua ka ñw aboke̩le̩ meji ku ma nyʼatu ane̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ nyʼef unyi ajo̩ko̩ le̩ ku me̩ dʼonobule̩ le̩ dufu wa, kpai e̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ alu ku me̩ go̩ ñw u le̩.

Tak abokolobia ku ma nyʼatu ane̩ le̩, nyʼejefu oñ ma du Rehab, kpai ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ kpai amo̩maye-wñ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ dufu; ma ño̩ kʼamefu-wñ chaka dufu ge̩; oñ ma mʼuma ko jʼej o̩do̩da uru abo Israe̩l le̩.
Taku ma fʼewo gujo rinyo̩ kpai e̩wñ du ki jʼefu-wñ; chai ajifa-wñ kpai o̩jamalia-wñ kpai e̩wñ eku ebijeikpa kpai ebije, ma mʼe-le̩ ko nyʼef akpulu ef unyi Jihofa.

Ama Jo̩shua fu Rehab ajo̩ko̩ le̩ kpai abo unyi ata-wñ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ jadu ku ma deju; oñ onobule̩ le̩ gugu alumeji abo Israe̩l gbogbo tʼojolu eñini, todabu kʼi kʼamonuche̩ ki Jo̩shua kpe̩ atʼane̩ Je̩riko le̩ maja.
Taku Jo̩shua je̩ ñwu ma go̩ iko le̩ kakini, Ama ki fʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi kwane̩ anʼo̩do̩ Je̩riko-i mu eju Jihofa. E̩re̩-wñ kʼi adudane̩ chʼo̩mo̩gba-wñ elenyo̩, alaku-wñ edudago chʼudabi-wñ elenyo̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa dʼugbo Jo̩shua; oñ uwohi-wñ dʼugbo du ane̩ le̩.
